title: Modern Square Enix is Lacking an Identity | Slightly Something Else
description:
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/theescapist1 This week on Slightly Something Else, Yahtzee and Marty discuss modern day Square Enix and its lack of identity as a publisher.

title: The Visual Language of Better Call Saul
description:
This week on In The Frame, with Better Call Saul returning for its final seasons Darren takes a look at how the show uses a lot of unique visual storytelling techniques.
